feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request to remove an image property from a specific Day 3 recommendation card.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA manifest, meta tags, root div, and service worker registration.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, colors, orientation, and icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first offline strategy with cache version v2.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component managing active tab state and rendering tabs, layout, PWA banner, and bottom bar.
frontend/src/components/BottomTabBar.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with four tabs and active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing Instagram credit link for @the_desi.musafir.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header branding, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Install banner showing PWA install instructions and actions for iOS and Android.
frontend/src/components/recommendation/B: Badge component rendering an icon and label with fixed orange styling and top-right positioning.
frontend/src/components/recommendation/C: Recommendation card displaying optional image, title, subtitle, description, and child elements.
frontend/src/config/monetization.ts: Exports WhatsApp number and URL generator for booking or contact links.
frontend/src/data/dwarkaGuide.ts: Defines interfaces for itinerary and recommendation data and exports structured multi‑day Dwarka travel plans.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Implements logic to detect PWA installability, handle the beforeinstallprompt event, and manage prompt display state.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and defines custom light/dark CSS variables including a Dwarka theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/tabs/ConnectivityTab.tsx: Renders connectivity info from Ahmedabad to Dwarka along with a rental service promo and transport tables.
frontend/src/tabs/RulesTimingsTab.tsx: Displays temple rules, prohibited items, timings, and general guidelines using styled cards and alerts.
frontend/src/tabs/StayFoodTab.tsx: Renders stay and food options using categorized cards populated from stayFoodData with styled lists.
frontend/src/tabs/YatraPlanTab.tsx: Provides a day selector and displays corresponding itinerary timelines with map links using local data.
frontend/src/utils/googleMaps.ts: Generates a Google Maps search URL by encoding a place name with a Dwarka location suffix.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for ongoing development.
